text:
Kim Kardashian has posted a hilarious clap back to a fan who accused her of making everything about herself, joking “consistency is key”.

Kardashian, 37, came under fire for posting about her own pregnancy with daughter Chicago when asked about her sister Kylie Jenner giving birth to her first child.

One fan tweeted: “@KimKardashian what was your reaction when you found out Kylie was pregnant!? #KUWTK.”

Kardashian replied: “I was so happy knowing I was having a baby too.”

The comment riled one user who hit back: “You always find ways to make things about yourself.”

Proving she has a sense of humour, Kardashian replied: “Always! Consistency is key.”

Her clap back was lauded by fans who couldn’t get enough of the “savage” response and flooded her comment with laughing gifs.

She was hailed a “queen” by many who were left “ crying”.

One tweeted: “Kim is the greatest SAVAGE ever.”

Another posted: “Yaaaaaas qweeeeen put him in his place lmfao.”

A third wrote: “LOL.. I love Kim’s consistency, always!”

Kardashian welcomed her daughter Chicago via a surrogate in January, one month before Jenner gave birth to daughter Stormi.

Jenner's seven-month-old tot, who she shares with boyfriend Travis Scott, made her debut on Keeping Up with the Kardashians on Sunday night.

The mother-of-one kept the pregnancy under wraps for the full nine months, something Kardashian described as “the best kept secret of our generation”.

Speaking to her youngest sister, Kardashian said: “Your friends deserve awards, seriously now you know you have real ones, because that would not have happened in my day.”
title: ‘Queen’ Kim Kardashian tweets SAVAGE response to fan accusing her of being self-obsessed
